@DirtyF @Scott_Helme @troyhunt @Netlify You can configure any headers you like. Including your own custom headers. https://t.co/Re1E3LtmKh Keep in mind that Cache-Control headers will override Expires headers if you have both though. https://t.co/FU1wAXKJo2
